action.description: The committee on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Lamosao, Belatti, Ichiyama, Morikawa, Woodson, Souza; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Poepoe, Shimizu;  Noes: none; and  Excused: none.
